name: Junkyard (Anruz, PenguinPEREZVONITE, Snic, alex.kostovitsky)
description:
You are one time use thing. You are a battery. Once you found yourself in a junkyard among trash and obscurity. But the Gods gave you a second chance. And now only you decide how to use given vital energy

CONTROLS:
WASD - move
LMB - attack
T  - pickup fire extinguisher
SPACE - use extinguisher
